Class UINodeViewable

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destroyable, DroppableX, Interactable, NamedObject, WorldObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UIEnsemble, UINetwork

    public abstract class UINodeViewable
extends UINeoNode
    UI Wrapper for Node Containers such as Ensembles and Networks.
